column14: Délaissés par M. Vander Donck, En son vivant Lic. en Medecine à Gand [and] Délaissés par M*** Libraire
column80: The small group of paintings and prints that appears near the end of this large Gent book sale were the property of the late M. vander Donck, a Gent licentiate in medicine.  Of the 8 lots of paintings, which consisted of Flemish, Dutch and anonymous artists, lots 45 to 49 were described in French while the last three lots, 50 to 52 were described in briefly in Dutch.  The sales results for the paintings were very low, not exceeding 2 francs (livres?) [still working on this.]

Vente à l'amiable.  Note on title page:  NB: ce sont les 4 tableaux, de Van Haver  This refers to Van Havre.  For the story of the pictures, see the entry in the National Gallery catalogue for no.852, the Chapeau de Paille.
